scripts.pre-release: version=$(cat ../forgejo-dist/package.json | jq -r '.version') && forgejoVersion=$(echo $version | sed -e 's/-[0-9]*$//g' | sed -e 's/^v//g') && jq '.version = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && curl -L https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/releases/download/v${forgejoVersion}/forgejo-${forgejoVersion}-linux-arm64 -o forgejo && chmod +x forgejo
